metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1232 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The mod_dialback module in Prosody before 0.9.9 does not properly generaterandom values for the secret token for server-to-server dialbackauthentication, which makes it easier for attackers to spoof servers via abrute force attack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1232` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

prosody - 0.9.9-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: prosody package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.9-1').
